title: Animated Load screens?

embed.description: SONG: Maxime Lebidois, Maxime Pinto - Sixty Seconds Left Kind of wished the loading screen looked like this. Sorry if your name is in that picture, I just sort of pulled it off Google.

body:
Hi guys,

I know this has been around a little while now, so I'm sure most of you have seen it by now but i think this idea would be amazing to have in the game.

Pro's
+Looks amazing
+More lively than just a % increase on load times
+Can be used for LCS broadcasts when showing team comps (again looking nicer and more "professional")
+Players feel bad ass (Player enjoyment/satisfaction? )

Con's
-120 Champs all with skins will take a while (though once its done you only need to do new ones)
-*Might* cause load screen to load slower (hopefully not game load time)
-Time/Money vs #worth debate

What do you guys think? 

Riot?

Debate team GO!

replies.body: I think it's awesome for those with awesome computers and there should be an option for people with less than capable computers to disable the animations. This would be a win/win situation for us consumers at least.
This should totally be a thing
that looks boring to look at
it would make people with toasters take longer to load in
Try making so you actually get in to loading screen 100% of the time first.

Cool idea, but not really worth the effort. 
I spend all the loading time alt tabbed anyway.
